/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and grass, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different colors are parked along the sides of the street, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
